trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組方法，以識別繼承的元件。

trans-unit.source: The InheritanceService can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.
trans-unit.target: InheritanceService 可用來尋找繼承的元件、 選取要忽略，並擷取每個追蹤服務的繼承類別的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定的元件，以繼承元件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋所有指定元件的基底類別的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 實作每個欄位<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>加入至指定的容器。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋要新增到指定的容器繼承元件的元件。

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: 要加入要繼承的元件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之類型的元件所繼承之指定元件要<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋元件的所有基底類別的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component.
trans-unit.target: 實作每個欄位<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>加入內部清單儲存<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>可識別繼承層級的元件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component is then added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 接著會將元件新增至指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: The base type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋要新增到指定的容器繼承元件的元件。

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: 要加入要繼承的元件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 允許所使用的資源<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>都重新配置用於其他用途。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處置的詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>參考。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件不能繼承，此方法會傳回值<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回這個元件的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的繼承屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref>描述繼承，此元件所來自的層級。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否要忽略指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的成員。

trans-unit.source: This member is either a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> or a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是其中一個<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>或<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> </xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: The component instance this member is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員繫結至元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的成員應包含繼承的元件; 集中否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
